snippet: Among the information spilled forth in a breach of Sony’s studio, perhaps nothing has riveted Hollywood more than a humiliating email exchange about Angelina Jolie.
abstract: Sony is scrambling to cope with fallout from incendiary emails posted by tabloid news site Gawker between producer Scott Rudin and company co-chairwoman Amy Pascal about Angelina Jolie; emails were part of disclosures from hacking attack on Sony Entertainment.

byline.original: By MICHAEL CIEPLY and BROOKS BARNES
byline.contributor: Nicole Perlroth contributed reporting from San Francisco.

lead_paragraph: Among the information spilled forth in a breach of Sony’s studio, perhaps nothing has riveted Hollywood more than a humiliating email exchange about Angelina Jolie.

headline.main: Sony Hack Reveals Email Crossfire Over Angelina Jolie and Steve Jobs Movie
headline.print_headline: Sony’s Dirty Laundry, for All to See
